name: dockscope-website
description: Official website for DockScope - Docker container monitoring and alerting system

scripts.dev: python3 -m http.server 8000 || python -m http.server 8000 || php -S localhost:8000 || npx http-server -p 8000
scripts.optimize: npm run build && npm run minify
scripts.minify: npm install -g uglify-js clean-css-cli && uglifyjs script.js -o dist/script.min.js && cleancss -o dist/styles.min.css styles.css

author: Govind Singh
